text: Habib Kot Junction railway station (, ) is located in Habib Kot village, Shikarpur district of Sindh province of the Pakistan. It is the junction of Kotri - Habib Kot via Dadu and Larkana branch railway line. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Shikarpur District Category:Railway stations on Rohri–Chaman Railway Line Category:Railway stations on Kotri–Attock Railway Line (ML 2)
title: Habib Kot Junction railway station
